DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is determine which method of informed consent improves comprehension in college educated patients in a private practice setting.
DOC.brief_title: The Age of OrthoInfo: A Randomized Controlled Trial Evaluating Patient Comprehension of Informed Consent in a Private Practice
DOC.criteria: Knee osteoarthritis patients over the age of 18 with a college education deemed appropriate for medical management with a knee injection. Patients without the capacity to provide consent Patients with a visual, auditory, psychological or tactile impairment requiring the assistance of another person.
